data.title: IRNA
data.text:
Full Name: Islamic Republic News Agency (IRNA)

Head: Managing Director - Mr. Ali Naderi

Address: 1943, Vali Asr Ave., Tehran, Iran

Phone: +98 21 82921120

Contact person: Mr. Zaman Rezakhani

Email: irnaproffice@gmail.com

Website: https://en.irna.ir

Founded as Pars News Agency in 1934, the agency renamed to IRNA in 1982.

OANA member since 1981

Owns Iran Cultural and Press Institute, which publish five daily newspapers, operates department in charge of photo sales

Over 1,100 employees

Bureau chiefs in U.N. headquarters, London, Moscow, Baghdad. Local correspondents in 16 other cities

News serviced in Persian, English, Arabic, Turkish, Urdu, Russian, German, French, Spanish, Chinese, Dari and Pashto
